summary: In 2021, Navy personnel accidentally caused 2 fuel leaks at Red Hill—a Navy facility on the island of O'ahu. The leaks contaminated drinking water for 93,000 people in the area. The Navy is working on closing this facility. Before the leaks, several DOD organizations had roles at Red Hill and contractors provided maintenance services. We reviewed contractors' roles at Red Hill. We also reported on...
title: Red Hill Fuel Storage: DOD's Contract Approaches and Oversight before and after the 2021 Fuel Leaks
